description: 学习条件句的基础用法：表示假设和结果的关系

basic_rules: 条件句表示假设和结果的关系
If引导条件句，主句表示结果
条件句和主句的位置可以互换
条件句用一般现在时，主句用一般将来时
usage_cases: 表示可能实现的条件：If it rains tomorrow, I will stay at home. (如果明天下雨，我就待在家里)
表示建议：If you study hard, you will pass the exam. (如果你努力学习，你就会通过考试)
表示警告：If you don't hurry, you will be late. (如果你不快点，你就会迟到)
common_errors: If it will rain tomorrow, I will stay at home. (错误) → If it rains tomorrow, I will stay at home. (正确)
If you will study hard, you will pass the exam. (错误) → If you study hard, you will pass the exam. (正确)
If it rain tomorrow, I will stay at home. (错误) → If it rains tomorrow, I will stay at home. (正确)
usage_tips: 条件句用一般现在时，主句用一般将来时
条件句和主句的位置可以互换

basic_conditional: If it rains tomorrow, I will stay at home.
If you study hard, you will pass the exam.
If he comes, I will tell him the news.
If she is free, she will help us.
If they arrive early, we will start the meeting.
reversed_order: I will stay at home if it rains tomorrow.
You will pass the exam if you study hard.
I will tell him the news if he comes.
She will help us if she is free.
We will start the meeting if they arrive early.
negative_conditional: If you don't study hard, you won't pass the exam.
If he doesn't come, I won't tell him the news.
If she isn't free, she won't help us.
If they don't arrive early, we won't start the meeting.
If it doesn't rain tomorrow, I won't stay at home.

templates.question: If it _____ tomorrow, I will stay at home.
If you study hard, you _____ pass the exam.
If it _____ tomorrow, I will stay at home.
If you study hard, you _____ pass the exam.

learning_objectives: 掌握条件句的基本用法
能够正确使用If + 条件句, 主句结构
了解条件句表示假设和结果的关系
